definitions.definition: The study or art of neologizing (creating new words).
A reformist school of 18th- and 19th-century Christian theology influenced by doctrinal rationalism and the methods of historical criticism .

main_definition: The study or art of neologizing (creating new words).
secondary_definitions: ( historical , originally derogatory ) A reformist school of 18th- and 19th-century Christian theology influenced by doctrinal rationalism and the methods of historical criticism .
